attributes.action: Launch a Factual Investigation into news reports conducted by the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following several breaches of competition rules by the BBC we the undersigned have no confidence in the reporting, news, competitions and programme production conducted by the BBC.

We the undersigned wish for an investigation conducted to validate the factual correctness of all previous reporting, news, comnpetitions and programming conducted by the BBC. We the undersigned feel this will also be an important step in re-establishing confidence in the BBC
